actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Potomac Heritage Trail located in portions of Maryland, Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia, and the District of Columbia, as a component of the National Trails System.
short_title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Act

summary.text: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to establish the Potomac Heritage Trail within Federal lands located in Maryland, Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia, and the District of Columbia. Provides for the inclusion of State, local, and privately-held lands. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to administer the lands designated under this Act.

titles.title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail Act

A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Potomac Heritage Trail located in portions of Maryland, Pennsylvania, Virginia, West Virginia, and the District of Columbia, as a component of the National Trails System.
